articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Meta is cutting prices for its VR headsets - CNN
articles.description: Meta is cutting prices for two of its virtual reality headsets as it continues trying to boost adoption for the nascent technology on which it has bet its future.
articles.content:
Meta is cutting prices for two of its virtual reality headsets as it continues trying to boost adoption for the nascent technology on which it has bet its future.
